languages.text: {n}Он заключает вас в крепкие объятия, голос падает до шепота.{/n} "Постарайся выжить. Иначе я пойду и убью там всех, и мне будет не важно, чисты они перед законом или нет".

{n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."
languages.original_text: {n}Он заключает вас в крепкие объятия, голос падает до шепота.{/n} "Постарайся выжить. Иначе я пойду и убью там всех, и мне будет не важно, чисты они перед законом или нет".

traits.locale_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to go there myself and kill everyone, and I won't care if they're guiltless in the eyes of the law or not."

{n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to go there myself and kill everyone, and I won't care if they're guiltless in the eyes of the law or not."

{n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

{n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

languages.text: {n}彼はあなたを力強く抱き寄せ、声をひそめてささやいた。{/n}「生き延びてください。もしあなたが死んだら…あそこにいる奴らを全員殺します。法的に無実だろうが、そんなことは関係ありません」
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はあなたを力強く抱き寄せ、声をひそめてささやいた。{/n}「生き延びてください。もしあなたが死んだら…あそこにいる奴らを全員殺します。法的に無実だろうが、そんなことは関係ありません」
{n}彼はあなたを力強く抱き寄せ、声をひそめてささやいた。{/n}「生き延びてください。もしあなたが死んだら…あそこにいる奴らを全員殺します。法的に無実だろうが、そんなことは関係ありません」

languages.text: {n}Er umarmt dich fest und flüstert:{/n} "Versucht, zu überleben. Anderenfalls töte ich alle hier unten, und es wird mir egal sein, ob sie vor dem Lex unschuldig sind oder nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er umarmt dich fest und flüstert:{/n} "Versucht, zu überleben. Anderenfalls töte ich alle hier unten, und es wird mir egal sein, ob sie vor dem Lex unschuldig sind oder nicht."
{n}Er umarmt dich fest und flüstert:{/n} "Versucht, zu überleben. Anderenfalls töte ich alle hier unten, und es wird mir egal sein, ob sie vor den Augen des Gesetzes unschuldig sind oder nicht."

languages.text: {n}Il s'approche pour vous enlacer et vous murmure :{/n} « Essayez de survivre. Si vous échouez, j'irai moi-même massacrer tout le monde, qu'ils soient coupables ou innocents aux yeux de la Lex. »
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'approche pour vous enlacer et vous murmure :{/n} « Essayez de survivre. Si vous échouez, j'irai moi-même massacrer tout le monde, qu'ils soient coupables ou innocents aux yeux de la Lex. »
{n}Il s'approche pour vous enlacer et vous murmure :{/n} « Essayez de survivre. Si vous échouez, j'irai moi-même massacrer tout le monde, qu'ils soient coupables ou innocents aux yeux de la loi. »

languages.text: {n}Te envuelve con un fuerte abrazo y baja la voz hasta susurrar:{/n} «Procure sobrevivir. De lo contrario bajaré y los mataré a todos, tanto si son culpables ante la Lex como si no».
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te envuelve con un fuerte abrazo y baja la voz hasta susurrar:{/n} «Procure sobrevivir. De lo contrario bajaré y los mataré a todos, tanto si son culpables ante la Lex como si no».
{n}Te envuelve con un fuerte abrazo y baja la voz hasta susurrar:{/n} «Procure sobrevivir. De lo contrario bajaré y los mataré a todos, tanto si son culpables a ojos de la ley como si no».

languages.text: {n}他把你紧紧搂在怀里，声音压低成了耳语。{/n}“努力活下去吧。如果你不幸身死，我会把那里的所有人都统统杀光。我根本不在乎那些人在法律层面是否无辜。”
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}他把你紧紧搂在怀里，声音压低成了耳语。{/n}“努力活下去吧。如果你不幸身死，我会把那里的所有人都统统杀光。我根本不在乎那些人在法律层面是否无辜。”
{n}他把你紧紧搂在怀里，声音变成了耳语。{/n}“努力活下去吧。如果你不幸身死，我会把那里的所有人都统统杀光。我根本不在乎那些人在法律层面是否无辜。”

languages.text: {n}Seni sıkıca kucaklıyor, fısıltıyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hayatta kalmaya çalış. Kalamazsan aşağıdaki herkesi öldürürüm. Lex'in gözünde suçsuz olup olmadıklarına bakmam bile."
languages.original_text: {n}He folds you into a tight embrace, his voice dropping to a whisper:{/n} "Try to survive. If you don't, I'm going to kill everyone down there, and I won't care if they're guiltless under the Lex or not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seni sıkıca kucaklıyor, fısıltıyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hayatta kalmaya çalış. Kalamazsan aşağıdaki herkesi öldürürüm. Lex'in gözünde suçsuz olup olmadıklarına bakmam bile."
{n}Seni sıkıca kucaklıyor, fısıltıyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hayatta kalmaya çalış. Kalamazsan aşağıdaki herkesi öldürürüm. Kanunların gözünde suçsuz olup olmadıklarına bakmam bile."
